scripts.build-angular: cd angular-workspace/ng14 && npm run build && cd ../ng15 && npm i && npm run build && cd ../ng16 && npm i && npm run build
scripts.update-mwc-dependants: cd angular-workspace/ng14/projects/trimble-oss/modus-angular-components && ncu -u --dep peer @trimble-oss* && npm i && cd ../../../../ng15/projects/trimble-oss/modus-angular-components && ncu -u --dep peer @trimble-oss* && npm i && cd ../../../../ng16/projects/trimble-oss/modus-angular-components && ncu -u --dep peer @trimble-oss* && npm i && cd ../../../../../react-workspace/react-17 && ncu -u @trimble-oss* && npm i && cd ../react-18 && ncu -u @trimble-oss* && npm i
